description: High Volume Course Section Fees Element

validation.validation: You may not enter both a Student Fee Group and a set of Course Fees.
A Student Charge Item cannot appear more than once within a set of Course and Additional Fees.
A Student Charge Item for an Additional Fee is not valid for the Academic Units or Academic Level of the Student Course for this Course Section.
A Student Charge Item for a Course Fee is not valid for the Academic Units or Academic Level of the Student Course for this Course Section.
Student Charge Items for Course and Additional Fees cannot match those on given Student Fee Groups.
The Student Fee Group is not valid for the Academic Units or Academic Level of the Student Course for this Course Section.
